snippet.title: An Amazing Wizard | Official Announcement Trailer | Upcoming Action Roguelike Game
snippet.description:
An Amazing Wizard is a 2D fast-paced, metroidvania-inspired action #roguelite. 
Coming to Kickstarter on March 8th!
https://bit.ly/AAW-KS

Learn New Spells and Enchant & Merge them to create your own magic! Gather artifacts and learn more than 250 skills. Traverse through 5 worlds and defeat epic bosses in your quest to collect stolen memories.

There are no checkpoints...

#platformer #actionadventure #rpg #metroidvania #roguelike #games  #foryou  #upcominggames #gametrailers #trailer
